appetizers.name: Texas Roadhouse Rolls and Cinnamon Honey Butter

cold sandwiches.name: BLT
cold sandwiches.Description: A BLT is a type of sandwich, named for the initials of its primary ingredients, bacon, lettuce, and tomato. - From Wikipedia

cold sandwiches.name: Turkey Club
cold sandwiches.Description: A club sandwich, also called a clubhouse sandwich, is a sandwich of bread (traditionally toasted), sliced cooked turkey, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.  - From Wikipedia

hot sandwiches.name: Hawaiian Panini
hot sandwiches.Description: Sandwich made with Italian bread, usually served warmed by grilling or toasting.  - From Wikipedia

hot sandwiches.name: Philly Cheesesteak
hot sandwiches.Description: A cheesesteak is a sandwich made from thinly sliced pieces of beefsteak and melted cheese in a long hoagie roll. A popular regional fast food, it has its roots in the U.S. city of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.  - From Wikipedia

hot sandwiches.name: French Dip
hot sandwiches.Description: A French dip sandwich, also known as a beef dip, is a hot sandwich consisting of thinly sliced roast beefon a 'French Roll'. Served with a dipping container of beef broth produced from the cooking process.  - From Wikipedia
